name: YamaYama
description: YamaYama is a whacky party game where you fight in all sorts of mini-games on your way to victory. The game utilises the FatSuit mechanic, where characters blow out and push other players. Play it at a party or with your family, anyone can learn!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 Processor: 2 ghz or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
